    • Constructor Detail

      • PlatformModel

        public PlatformModel(float x,
                     float y,
                     float rotation,
                     com.badlogic.gdx.math.Polygon shape,
                     java.lang.String data)
        Constructs a model with a position and a rotation.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of this entity in meters.
        y - The y-coordinate of this entity in meters.
        rotation - The current rotation of this entity in radians.
        shape - The model associated shape
        data - Information about the platform model
